Articles.Content: So i haven't played KSP in a while and when i went back to it, the game was incredibly slow. The loading screen with the art loads fine but when the music starts and the mun comes in to view, the game slows drastically and it takes a few minutes for the options to start the game to appear. I attempted to reinstall the game but it didn't work.

Is your game installed in your main C:/ drive or another drive?

Do all games load slowly or just KSP? I had an issue where games loaded slowly because I had them installed on an external hard drive which was very slow. Made one game unplayable. I never noticed the issue because it only happened in online games for some reason.

KSP could be experiencing a similar issue.
KSP is installed on the C:/ drive. KSP is the only game that cant produce a main screen. Every other game runs fine.
